Description: Raydan Co (known as: Raydan) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Parallel Market” (NOMU) since February 2017. Raydan operates within the Consumer Services sector focusing on Restaurants. Raydan is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1989.
